xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 13 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 00:16 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 00:18 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu 04:23 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 08:39 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 10:24 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 10:24 <kushalkhandelwal> Hey sdumitriu1 10:29 <sdumitriu1> Hey 10:29 <sdumitriu1> How's it going? 10:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Nothing much 10:30 <kushalkhandelwal> At home after a long time 10:30 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 10:30 <kushalkhandelwal> Everything going great 10:30 <kushalkhandelwal> You done with shopping ? :P 10:30 <sdumitriu1> Hehe 10:30 <sdumitriu1> Sure 10:31 <sdumitriu1> Actually no, I have to go buy food for the group meeting 10:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh 10:31 <kushalkhandelwal> Meeting 10:31 <kushalkhandelwal> for ? 10:32 <kushalkhandelwal> How is it going over there ? 10:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Is it hot over there in Toronto ? 10:32 <sdumitriu1> 4 degrees 10:32 <sdumitriu1> Hailstorm yesterday 10:32 <kushalkhandelwal> I envy you 10:32 <sdumitriu1> Dark clouds 10:32 <sdumitriu1> It's gonna rain soon 10:32 <kushalkhandelwal> 40-50 degrees over here :( 10:33 <sdumitriu1> Too much for me 10:33 <kushalkhandelwal> Yep its too hot 10:34 <sdumitriu1> We have a weekly meeting at the lab 10:34 <kushalkhandelwal> But its fun at times 10:34 <sdumitriu1> Presenting stuff 10:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh 10:34 <kushalkhandelwal> Working on some new feature ? 10:34 <sdumitriu1> Today our new summer interns will present themselves 10:34 <kushalkhandelwal> You have summer interns in your lab ? 10:34 <kushalkhandelwal> I didn't knew 10:35 <kushalkhandelwal> Do you have international interns ? I would have applied 10:35 <sdumitriu1> No, they're local 10:36 <sdumitriu1> They're from China I think, but they study at the university 10:36 <sdumitriu1> They won some scholarships for working in our lab 10:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh from the university itself 10:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Ah 10:36 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 10:37 <sdumitriu1> People are fighting to get to work in our lab :) 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> Hehe 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> I would try next year :) 10:37 <kushalkhandelwal> Today would start working on XWiki Platform and Java 10:43 <kushalkhandelwal> You would be busy the whole day ? 10:47 <sdumitriu1> Here's a very easy issue for XWiki for you: https://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-5950 10:47 <sdumitriu1> I have to go now, will be back at the lab in 30 minutes 10:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Wait 10:47 <kushalkhandelwal> one minute 10:47 <kushalkhandelwal> one more thing 10:47 <kushalkhandelwal> Issue 429 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> in dbwebhomesheet 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> it sets this 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> "translationPrefix" : "patient.livetable.", 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> which is appended to every column name 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> I will try Xwiki : 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 10:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Let me set up the dev environment for it 11:20 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 12:59 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 13:14 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 13:34 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 13:39 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 14:22 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 15:35 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 19:21 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 21:38 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 22:42 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm
